body:
Grace and Jonathan,

Sorry to post back so late but I finished adding all of the options with boundary conditions a few days ago and updated the example file:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=THERM_Export_Workflow&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)

The THERM components are now wired to use NFRC boundary conditions by default and you can full customize them with the new "Honeybee_Custom Radiant Environment" component.

Let me know if you have any questions and I will start making some youtube tutorials of the THERM components within the next couple of months.

-Chris
